column4: I just got my sound configured the way I want for EVERY single other thing I have.
I have sound playing youtube AND my mp3 player.
IT must have.
It use to!
I've had my sound configured the same way for at least half a week now.
And it didn't start dying until now.
oss emulation?
let me guess that would screw everything i've done up.
Do you have alsa set in firefox?
How did it just die for me, and works fine for everyone else?
have an .asoundrc file?
so what is the whole problem again?
is it flash based?
try installing aoss
k
is this a player that runs in the browser
sudo pico /etc/firefox/firefoxrc
it's an editor
close firefox and run this: ps auwx | grep firefox
and check if esd is running
if you have software mixing it could be fucking over your sound
